messages.saveSuccess: Stop loss saved and current risk set as Initial R
messages.initialRSet: Current stop loss risk (${{amount}}) has been set as Initial R
messages.initialRSetFailed: Failed to set as Initial R
messages.riskExceeds2Percent: Position risk is {{risk}}% which exceeds the typical risk management threshold (2%)
messages.riskExceedsInitial: New risk is {{percent}}% higher than existing maximum risk

tooltip.initialR: If checked, the current stop loss risk will be set as the Initial R (maximum risk) for this position

successAlert.title: Chart Captured
successAlert.description: Chart has been saved to ChartBook

dailyRiskLimit.withUpsideTooltip: Subtract profits from losses (actual net risk)

todayTrades.individualViewNotReady: Individual trade view is coming soon.

dailyRiskLimit.title: Daily Risk Limit
dailyRiskLimit.downsideOnlyDesc: Calculate losses only, ignore profits. Most conservative risk management approach.
dailyRiskLimit.withUpsideDesc: Subtract realized profits from risk to calculate actual net risk. Mathematically accurate calculation method.

currentValue.title: Current Assets
currentValue.description: Total portfolio value. Sum of cash + stock valuation.

totalReturn.title: Total Return
totalReturn.description: Overall return from initial capital. (Current Assets - Initial Capital) / Initial Capital * 100

maxDrawdown.title: Maximum Drawdown (MDD)
maxDrawdown.description: Maximum decline from peak. Key risk management metric.

tradingDays.title: Trading Days
tradingDays.description: Number of days with actual trading activity.

stockCash.title: Stock/Cash Ratio
stockCash.description: Ratio of stocks to cash in portfolio.

winRate.title: Win Rate
winRate.description: Percentage of profitable trades. Win rate alone doesn't determine profitability.

avgWinR.title: Average Win R
avgWinR.description: Average R-multiple for winning trades. R represents risk-reward ratio.

avgLossR.title: Average Loss R
avgLossR.description: Average R-multiple for losing trades. Ideally close to -1R.

avgPositionsDay.title: Avg Positions/Day
avgPositionsDay.description: Average number of positions held per day.

avgHolding.title: Avg Holding Period
avgHolding.description: Average holding period for all positions.

avgWinnerHolding.title: Winner Holding Period
avgWinnerHolding.description: Average holding period for profitable positions.

avgLoserHolding.title: Loser Holding Period
avgLoserHolding.description: Average holding period for losing positions.

openPositions.title: Open Positions
openPositions.description: Current open positions. F=Freeroll (zero risk), R=positions with risk.

portfolioOpenRisk.title: Portfolio Pure Risk
portfolioOpenRisk.description: Pure risk percentage of open positions. Based on distance to stop loss.

portfolioNetRisk.title: Portfolio Total Risk
portfolioNetRisk.description: Total risk including unrealized P&L. Negative means profit state.

portfolioOpenRiskDollar.title: Pure Risk Amount
portfolioOpenRiskDollar.description: Pure risk of current positions in dollar amount.

portfolioNetRiskDollar.title: Total Risk Amount
portfolioNetRiskDollar.description: Total risk including unrealized P&L in dollar amount.

expectancy.title: Expectancy
expectancy.description: Average expected return per trade. Must be positive for long-term profitability.

expectancyR.title: Expectancy R
expectancyR.description: Average expected R-multiple per trade. Above 0.3R indicates excellent system.

payoffRatio.title: Payoff Ratio
payoffRatio.description: Ratio of average win to average loss. Above 1 means wins are larger than losses.

avgRiskPerTrade.title: Avg Risk per Trade
avgRiskPerTrade.description: Average risk percentage per trade. 2% or less recommended.

avgSizePerTrade.title: Avg Size per Trade
avgSizePerTrade.description: Average position size relative to total assets.

stdDevReturns.title: Return Std Deviation
stdDevReturns.description: Volatility of returns. Lower is more stable.

downsideDeviation.title: Downside Deviation
downsideDeviation.description: Measures only downside volatility. Better for risk assessment.

sharpeRatio.title: Sharpe Ratio
sharpeRatio.description: Risk-adjusted excess return. Above 1 is good, above 2 is excellent.

maxConsecutiveWins.title: Max Consecutive Wins
maxConsecutiveWins.description: Maximum number of consecutive winning trades.

maxConsecutiveLosses.title: Max Consecutive Losses
maxConsecutiveLosses.description: Maximum number of consecutive losing trades. Predicts psychological pressure.

raroc.title: RAROC
raroc.description: Risk-Adjusted Return on Capital. Evaluates return relative to risk taken.
